=======
History
=======

0.1.0 (2017-06-15)
------------------

* Package creation.

0.2.1 (2017-07-03)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.

0.4.0 (2017-07-07)
------------------

New features:
* added a logo
* added auto-deploy to PyPI
* added test cases for local co-registration

Bugfixes:
* fixed warping issues in case only very few tie points could be identified
